definition.name: azure-resource-login
definition.description: Gets an Access Token for an specific Azure resource

inputs.name: creds
inputs.description: Azure credentials for the service principal to log in

inputs.name: resource-url
inputs.description: Canonical resource url for what you want the token for

inputs.name: resource-type-name
inputs.description: Optional resouce type name, supported values: AadGraph, AnalysisServices, Arm, Attestation, Batch, DataLake, KeyVault, OperationalInsights, ResourceManager, Storage, Synapse. Default value is Arm if not specified.

steps.name: Adquiring access token
